How do I install it on my mac?

It is imperative you do not add these two lines below to your hosts file until after you have completed & activated ADOBE CS6.  If you add these lines first, the adobe installer will not accept any of the numbers the Keygen generates.

127.0.0.1 lmlicenses.wip4.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com

1) Disconnect from the internet completely
2) FOLLOW ALL THE INSTRUCTIONS IN THE TORRENT FILE EXACTLY AS WRITTEN until CS6 is activated
3) Add those two lines to your hosts file manually or run the provided program.
4) Re-connect to the internet.

@jsrg1 i pulled this from another forum to get around the "Error writting private/etc/host: no such file or directory" security issue with Mountain Lion, expanding on @jd1511's instructions:

Go to utilities, terminal

enter sudo vi /etc/hosts

(Keyboard only....)

Press i (this will enter insert mode).

Make your changes / add your ip's hosts etc.

Then press escape to come out of insert mode.

Then type (you will see at the bottom):

:wq 

^that will write and quit the file

to quite without saving its, :q!

to write it's just :w

I had troubles with the keygen. it said invalid request code. heres how I fixed it:

-uninstall all your adobe programs with adobe's uninstaller (Programms->Utilities->Adobe Installers)

-download Adobe Cleaner Tool from Adobe and run it.

-as already mentioned in the instructions make sure your hosts file is clean of all adobe blocked domains.

-manually delete these folders/files:

Library/Application Support/Adobe/SLCache
Library/Application Support/Adobe/SLStore

Macintosh HD/Library/Application Support/Adobe 
Macintosh HD/Library/Preferences (only Adobe files!)
Macintosh HD/Library/Application Support/regid.1986-12.com.adobe
Macintosh HD/Users/MeinName/Library/Application Support/Adobe
Macintosh HD/Users/MeinName/Library/Preferences (only Adobe files!)
Macintosh HD/private/var/db/receipts (only Adobe files! (bom+plist files))

now it works like a charm :)
